name: Void Elementor WHMCS Elements For Elementor Page Builder
author: voidCoders, innovs

sections.description:
This plugin adds new element / widget such as: Domain Search, Live ajax domain Search, Pricing table, Live pricing table which fetches pricing from your WHMCS directly so you won’t have to change prices each time you update your pricing in WHMCS!, Non live mode for pricing table, Knowledge base box for searcing and posting the search to whmcs or whmcs bridge page. It’s and easy and handy plugin for you if you want to start hosting business and use wordpress site with Elementor !

  • Live Ajax Domain Search
  • Knowledge Base form for WHMCS
  • Live pricing table from WHMCS
  • Pricing table with choice of your currency from WHMCS!
  • Normal pricing table.

For more details & Demo :VOID Elementor WHMCS Elements.
For our other elementor & WP works visit : voidCoders.
For updates follow us on : Facebook.

Elementor WHMCS Elements Pro.
Pro Version Features:

  • All of the free features +
  • Live Ajax Domain Search
  • 5+ style of Live pricing table from WHMCS
  • 10+ Style od Live pricing table with Elementor pro and WHMCS Elements
  • Normal pricing table.
  • Domain TLD pricing table from WHMCS directly
  • WHMCS login form
  • Works with Elementor Pro’s Pricing Table!! Now you can use styles of Elemetnor pro’s pricing table and use the power of WHMCS Elements Pro!

Video Preview

Get Hosting WordPress theme with WHMCS Elements Pro included.

What Does This plugin give you?

  1. Ajax domain search with limited style options
  2. Use WHMCS pricing directly on your wp site
  3. Use Knowledge base form on site so people can search that
  4. More features are available on our Elementor WHMCS Elements Pro version of the plugin, such as : More style for pricing tables, more style control, domain pricing table from whmcs live.

Need more? Checkout Elementor WHMCS Elements Pro.

Note: This plugin is an addon of Elementor Page Builder (https://wordpress.org/plugins/elementor/) and will only work with Elementor Page Builder installed. And your elementor should be up to date to latest version

Dependencies

The Plugin’s domain search depends on api call to external free service provided by http://whoiz.herokuapp.com/.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin folder after extracting it to the “/wp-content/plugins/(the folder of the extracted plugin)” directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Go to elementor page builder mode and then you should see void elements if you scroll a bit in the elements of elementor. The live pricing, name etc will be shown only when you save the page and view it in the front end of the site.
sections.faq:
Where can to find the new element added

Our Widgets For Elementor Page Builder adds a new section in the elementor live page builder named : VOID ELEMENTS. There you will see the widget which you can drag and drop and config settings

1.0.0
